page.title: 19PARKING IN HELSTON
page.content: Helston has three main car parks. The largest is in Trengrouse Way. At the moment it provides parking for approximately 170 cars. However, the site of the car park is now to be used to build a new supermarket for the town. Another car park is to be found in Tyacke Road which has pedestrian access to Coinagehall Street. This car park can take over 100 cars but the surface is uneven and there are no markings. There is another car park in Wendron Street for 54 cars at a cost of 30 pence per day. Down by the cattle market is another car park which is rarely used by shoppers because it is far away from the main shops. Beside the new by-pass around Helston there is a free parking place for 50 cars.
